mapper.sql: a.ID as id, a.AGREEMENT_TYPE as agreementType, a.ACCOUNT_TYPE as accountType, a.AGREEMENT_NUMBER as agreementNumber, a.AGREEMENT_LOCATION as agreementLocation, a.ACCOUNT_PORTFOLIO_TYPE as accountPortfolioType
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_COMMON_AGREEMENT_TYPE( ID , AGREEMENT_TYPE , ACCOUNT_TYPE , AGREEMENT_NUMBER , AGREEMENT_LOCATION , ACCOUNT_PORTFOLIO_TYPE ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{agreementType} , #{accountType} , #{agreementNumber} , #{agreementLocation} , #{accountPortfolioType} )

INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_COMMON_AGREEMENT_TYPE
ID ,
AGREEMENT_TYPE ,
ACCOUNT_TYPE ,
AGREEMENT_NUMBER ,
AGREEMENT_LOCATION ,
ACCOUNT_PORTFOLIO_TYPE
#{id} ,
#{agreementType} ,
#{accountType} ,
#{agreementNumber} ,
#{agreementLocation} ,
#{accountPortfolioType}
mapper.update:
UPDATE ACCOUNT_COMMON_AGREEMENT_TYPE
AGREEMENT_TYPE = #{agreementType} ,
ACCOUNT_TYPE = #{accountType} ,
AGREEMENT_NUMBER = #{agreementNumber} ,
AGREEMENT_LOCATION = #{agreementLocation} ,
ACCOUNT_PORTFOLIO_TYPE = #{accountPortfolioType}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_COMMON_AGREEMENT_TYPE( ID , AGREEMENT_TYPE , ACCOUNT_TYPE , AGREEMENT_NUMBER , AGREEMENT_LOCATION , ACCOUNT_PORTFOLIO_TYPE )
SELECT #{item.id} , #{item.agreementType} , #{item.accountType} , #{item.agreementNumber} , #{item.agreementLocation} , #{item.accountPortfolioType} FROM DUAL

update.foreach: UPDATE ACCOUNT_COMMON_AGREEMENT_TYPE SET AGREEMENT_TYPE = #{item.agreementType} , ACCOUNT_TYPE = #{item.accountType} , AGREEMENT_NUMBER = #{item.agreementNumber} , AGREEMENT_LOCATION = #{item.agreementLocation} , ACCOUNT_PORTFOLIO_TYPE = #{item.accountPortfolioType} WHERE ID = #{item.id}

mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_COMMON_AGREEMENT_TYPE SET AGREEMENT_TYPE = #{agreementType} , ACCOUNT_TYPE = #{accountType} , AGREEMENT_NUMBER = #{agreementNumber} , AGREEMENT_LOCATION = #{agreementLocation} , ACCOUNT_PORTFOLIO_TYPE = #{accountPortfolioType} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM ACCOUNT_COMMON_AGREEMENT_TYPE a WHERE a.ID = #{id}

SELECT
FROM ACCOUNT_COMMON_AGREEMENT_TYPE a WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.AGREEMENT_TYPE LIKE '%'||#{agreementType}||'%'
AND a.ACCOUNT_TYPE LIKE '%'||#{accountType}||'%'
AND a.AGREEMENT_NUMBER LIKE '%'||#{agreementNumber}||'%'
AND a.AGREEMENT_LOCATION LIKE '%'||#{agreementLocation}||'%'
AND a.ACCOUNT_PORTFOLIO_TYPE LIKE '%'||#{accountPortfolioType}||'%'
